title: How to play
text:
Congruent is a numbers puzzle game.
The aim of the game is to get each number on a 3x3 board of numbers to be exactly the same.

title: How to play
text: One of the numbers is always selected. This number can be moved by using the arrow keys

title: How to play
text: Each time you move the selector, the number you select will increase in number by one.

title: The End!
text: You've successfully completed all of the levels Parity currently has to offer. If you enjoyed the challenge, please make sure to share with Others!
